message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I think I can agree on a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  However, I can't go lower than $110 for this product. I believe it's still a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
